title: Rolls-Royce - Worldwide sales volume of automobiles 2007 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of sold automobiles has increased over the Year.
Number of sold automobiles is gradually increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of sold automobiles, about 4063.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Number of sold automobiles, of value 2711.0 was reported at Year 2010
